definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: At last, an advanced technology is put forward to design automotive torque converter.
sentences.chinese: 最後，建立了轎車液力變矩器的現代設計方法。

sentences.english: The stator resides in the very center of the torque converter.
sentences.chinese: 定子居住在非常中心地帶的液力變矩器。

sentences.english: But variable torque converter provides a good means for solving the problem.
sentences.chinese: 可調液力變矩器爲解決這一問題提供了良好的途徑。

sentences.english: The workover rig should not be matched under lockup conditions of the converter.
sentences.chinese: 修井機在額定負荷時，不應匹配在變矩器閉鎖工況。

sentences.english: The torque converter includes a stator having a plurality of stator blades.
sentences.chinese: 該液力變矩器包括具有多個導輪葉片的導輪。

sentences.english: An automatic transmission is connected to the engine via a torque converter.
sentences.chinese: 自動變速器是通過液力變矩器與發動機相連的。
